_header: I recommend me to you with heart and mind
_description: A love letter to his mistress — thirteen cross-rhymed quatrains

BodRawC813.First Lines:
I recommende me to yow with harte and myndeof your welfare I desyre
                    to here…
BodRawC813.Last Lines:
…loue hym that ys youres stylland to hym I pray yow be
                    kynde
BodRawC813.Editions:
Padelford,  Frederick Morgan. 
             “Liedersammlungen des xvi. Jahrhunderts…IV.” 
             Anglia
         31 (1908): 309-96: 313-15.
